subject: Sir,
body:
Sir,
It is vital to bring to your notice that based on the recent Financial
conference held in Geneva (Switzerland), in which debts and
settlements of debts with special attention to foreign debts were
discussed, we hereby inform you that your entitlement fund which has
since been lying unclaimed has been approved for payment by the World
Bank in conjunction with United Nations Security Organization
(Financial Department) for immediate settlement.
In lieu of the aforementioned, we also inform you that the total sum
of US$12.6 Million (Twelve Million, Six Hundred Thousand United States
Dollars only) has been approved in your favor and your payment file
has been referred to our offshore payment bank in Japan for further
processing and subsequent settlement. The bank has therefore been
informed concerning this development and have been mandated to ensure
that your payment file is processed adequately and settled
accordingly. You will therefore be contacted by Norinchukin Bank of
Japan as soon as we receive your response to this information in
confirmation of your receipt of it thereof.
Finally, we require that you send your response to ………………….. in lieu
of this information as soon as it reaches you, to enable us instruct
our offshore payment Bank in Japan on what to do concerning your
payment.
We hope towards hearing from you as soon as this information reaches you.
Yours very truly,
 Axel van Trotsenburg.
(Managing Director of Operations).

subject: Re: Sir,
body:
Hello Axel van,

Thank you for your message. It's quite interesting to hear about this unclaimed fund. I must admit, I'm a bit surprised as I wasn't aware of any such funds in my name.

Could you please provide more details about this Financial conference held in Geneva? Also, how did my name come up in relation to these funds? 

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Terry
